name: @nnaumovski/react-api-client
description: Configurable API client with React provider and hooks
author: nnaumovski

scripts.publish-package: npm pack --dry-run && npm publish --access public && rm -rf index.js index.d.ts index.js.map dist
scripts.prepack: npm run build && npm run move-files
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run build && npm run move-files
